experiences.title: Graduate Research Assistant
experiences.description: I am currently a research assistant at the Embedded Systems Laboratory at Purdue. I am designing an end-to-end hardware security system for Unmanned Ariel Vehicles as a part of the Cognisense JUMP 2.0 center.

experiences.title: Hardware Engineering Intern
experiences.description: Understood the design architecture and performed DFM analysis for PCBs used in Cisco access space routers.
experiences.description2: Worked with the Agile Product development methodology and proposed value engineering ideas to reduce the BOM cost.

experiences.title: Technical Head
experiences.description: Designed End-to-End detailed Technical Architecture for the autonomous UAV that took part in the Student Unmanned Aerial Systems (SUAS) 2022 competition held in Maryland, US.
experiences.description2: Led and guided a team of 50+ undergraduates for the development of the entire UAV system, including both hardware and software components.

experiences.title: Research Intern
experiences.description: Designed Controller Area Network and RS485 interface shield for STM32 G474 for the Stoch3 quadruped.
experiences.description2: Carried out the torque characterization tests for the U10 Plus BLDC motor and assembled the electronic architecture for the 3-DOF prototype leg.
